attributes.action: Politicians to be the first to go to the war front.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this so we dont have mps feverishly calling for war that no one supports and no one want to send their kids to die for
attributes.background: Government to assure that all politicians advocating or supporting war/ conflict involving the uk should spend atleast 2 months on the front line before we send our people to die

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we're not sure if you want a requirement for all MPs to have had military experience, or whether you'd like there to be a requirement that they take part in a visit with military personnel who are deployed. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
